signatory_informations_description: To issue your licenses, you must accept the Microsoft customer agreement. Please check that the information below matches the signatory.
signatory_informations_message: By clicking "Confirm", you will be redirected to the Microsoft site to validate your request. After validation, close the tab, then return to this setup tunnel.
signatory_step2_description: To deliver your service, confirm that you have signed your contract with Microsoft.
signatory_step2_button: I have signed the Microsoft contract
signatory_success_message: Your service has been successfully delivered and is now available!
